DOCNAME: CASE OF GÜLŞEN AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE and GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE ORG ( PERSON ORG ) expropriated plots of land belonging to the applicants . A committee of experts assessed the value of the plots and the relevant amount was paid to the applicants .

CARDINAL . Following the applicants ' request for increased compensation , on CARDINAL DATE and DATE ORG Instance awarded them additional compensation plus interest at the statutory rate applicable at the date of the court 's decision in respect of each of the applicants .
CARDINAL . On DATE , DATE , DATE , and DATE ORG upheld ORG of First Instance 's judgments in respect of PERSON , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON , ORG , PERSON and PERSON , respectively .
CARDINAL . By decisions of DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE , ORG rejected the applicants ' requests for the rectification of its decisions .
CARDINAL . On DATE , CARDINAL DATE and DATE ORG paid the amounts due to PERSON and PERSON , ORG , PERSON , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON respectively . Details are indicated in the table below :
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the Aka v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-VI , pp . DATE , § § DATE ) .
